title: World Definition
description: Defines a self-contained, instantiable game world, including its identity and initial entity population.

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema for editor support.

id.description: Required. The unique, namespaced ID for this world (e.g., 'core:main_campaign', 'my_mod:horde_arena').

name.description: Required. The human-readable name of the world, used for display in UI menus.

description.description: Optional. A brief, human-readable summary of the world.

instances.description: A list of all entity instances to be created when the world is initialized.

instanceId.description: Required. The unique, namespaced identifier for this specific entity instance. Must match an entity instance file.

componentOverrides.description: Optional. Component overrides for this instance only.
